channel.title: CVE Feed for aEnrich -- a+HRD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for aEnrich -- a+HRD

item.title: CVE-2022-39040|2024-08-03T11:10:32.279Z -- aenrich -- a%2Bhrd
item.description: aEnrich a+HRD log read function has a path traversal vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and download arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2022-39041|2024-08-03T11:10:32.278Z -- aenrich -- a%2Bhrd
item.description: aEnrich a+HRD has insufficient user input validation for specific API parameter. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary SQL commands to access, modify and delete database.

item.title: CVE-2022-26676|2024-08-03T05:11:44.012Z -- aenrich -- a%2Bhrd
item.description: aEnrich a+HRD has inadequate privilege restrictions, an unauthenticated remote attacker can use the API function to upload and execute malicious scripts to control the system or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2022-39042|2024-08-03T11:10:32.451Z -- aenrich -- a%2Bhrd
item.description: aEnrich a+HRD has improper validation for login function. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and access API function to perform arbitrary system command or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2022-39039|2024-08-03T11:10:32.391Z -- aenrich -- a%2Bhrd
item.description: aEnrichâ€™s a+HRD has inadequate filtering for specific URL parameter. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to send arbitrary HTTP(s) request to launch Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attack, to perform arbitrary system command or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2022-26675|2024-08-03T05:11:44.834Z -- aenrich -- a%2Bhrd
item.description: aEnrich a+HRD has inadequate filtering for special characters in URLs. An unauthenticated remote attacker can bypass authentication and perform path traversal attacks to access arbitrary files under website root directory.
